models.short_description: A camera component that returns images that differ from previous images

first_run: rm -f module.tar.gz && tar czf module.tar.gz requirements.txt src/*.py src/models/*.py meta.json setup.sh reload.sh

build.build: rm -f module.tar.gz && tar czf module.tar.gz requirements.txt src/*.py src/models/*.py meta.json setup.sh reload.sh
